item.title: Unpacking Unpacking in Python
item.description: This post describes the operation of unpacking in Python. From function definitions and calls to assignments and displays.

item.title: Hello, Pelican!
item.description: First, post! Using pelican as the static site generator for my github.io personal page. Let's see how this goes.
